title: Input Devices Unresponsive In-Game (Mouse and Keyboard)
body:
So I've had this problem for about a week now and I'm slowly fading from not being able to play.

The client is perfectly fine for me, but as soon as a load into a game, my mouse and keyboard become unresponsive. The League In-game cursor doesn't even show, it just stays as my desktop mouse pointer. I think it may be due to my monitor settings, because trying it on my TV screen was fine. I've not had this problem before, but since the last patch I've been unable to play.

Plz halp

{{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
Turn off your discord overlay.

Issues like these are pretty much always caused by something over the top of the League window (like an overlay) breaking. You can't interact with the overlay and it's stuck over the top of League so the result is you can't do anything.
